name: Matrix
body:
MatrixEngine is an open source OpenGL engine, which aims to be simple, cross-platform and powerful. It runs on Windows, Linux, OSX and (not yet) Android. It supports modern OpenGL (4.5+) and it's written in C++. 
 
## See it in action 
Here are some screenshots of the engine: 

### Assimp model loading and Instanced rendering
![Assimp model loading and Instanced rendering (OSX)](http://i.imgur.com/2lF7av4.jpg)

## Scene Graph 
The engine features a Scene Graph. The lightsaber in the picture is a child of the character's mesh. 
![Scene Graph](http://imgur.com/NdYwlAF.jpg)
 
## First Person Camera
All the maths in the engine is done using GLM
![Textures, Materials and First Person Camera](http://imgur.com/9ivTweK.jpg)
